amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for nuclear weapons technology programs by $298,221,000, and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the nuclear weapons technology account by $298,000,000, and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A022) Failed by recorded vote: 138 - 281 (Roll no. 332).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A022) Failed by recorded vote: 138 - 281 (Roll no. 332).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A022) offered by Mr. Polis.
